text: James David "Buddy" Ryan (February 17, 1931 - June 28, 2016) was an American football coach in the National Football League (NFL) and American Football League (AFL). During his 35-season coaching career, Ryan served as the head coach of the Philadelphia Eagles and Arizona Cardinals, and the defensive coordinator of the Chicago Bears and Houston Oilers of the NFL. Ryan died at his ranch in Shelbyville, Kentucky on June 28, 2016 from cancer, aged 85.. ==References== Category:1931 births Category:2016 deaths Category:Cancer deaths in Kentucky Category:American football coaches Category:Sportspeople from Oklahoma
title: Buddy Ryan
